mapper.select: SELECT l.no AS lawyerNo, l.name AS name, l.lawyer_intro AS shortIntro, l.intro_detail AS longIntro, l.profile AS profileImagePath, l.office_name AS officeName, l.consult_price AS consultPrice, CONCAT_WS(' ', l.road_address, l.detail_address) AS officeAddress, l.office_number AS officePhone, l.email AS email FROM lawyer l WHERE l.no = #{lawyerNo}

SELECT t.no, t.name, t.price, t.discount_rate AS discountRate, t.thumbnail_path AS thumbnailPath FROM template t WHERE t.user_no = 1 AND t.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY t.sales_count DESC, t.created_at DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT b.no, b.title, b.content FROM board b WHERE b.user_no = 1 ORDER BY b.created_at DESC LIMIT 5
